web-development.title: Interactive Project Lifecycle
web-development.description: This project introduces an interactve online web platform to view business process cycle documentations instead of viewing it in the form of static PDF documents.

data-analytics.title: Netflix Recommendation using Restricted Boltzmann Machine
data-analytics.description: To recommend movies to users based on what other users have liked.

iot.title: IOTPet
iot.description:
Based on a harvard study (see below for reference), 1 in 4 kids drink no water during the course of their day. Our IOT solution was inspired by a game similar to the popular pet game 'Tamagotchi' to encourage children 
 to drink water regularly.
